cluster_classes.class_description: Abstract ideas referring to phenomena beyond normal scientific understanding, including the supernatural, the paranormal, and the broader notion of the unknown and its existence.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Phenomena or entities believed to exist beyond normal scientific understanding; unexplained or mysterious aspects of reality.

members.entity_description: Phenomena or entities believed to exist beyond normal scientific understanding, frequently referenced in explanatory stories and urban legends.
Broad concept of unexplained or mysterious aspects of reality that provoke curiosity and fear, often addressed in stories and folklore.
Events or phenomena that appear beyond normal experience or scientific explanation, associated with legends and hauntings.
The question of whether supernatural phenomena are real in listeners’ lives.

cluster_classes.class_description: Story-focused entities that describe tales or narrative frames centered on supernatural or unexplained events in folklore and urban legends.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Stories focusing on supernatural phenomena and unexplained events; unresolved questions that inspire continued creation of legends.

members.entity_name: tales of the supernatural and the unknown
members.entity_description: Stories focusing on supernatural phenomena and unexplained or mysterious events.
Unresolved questions or unexplained events that inspire continued creation of urban legends.

cluster_classes.class_description: Concrete locations or manifestations associated with supernatural activity, such as haunted places, apparitions, and mysterious beings in legends.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Haunted houses, ghostly apparitions, and mysterious creatures as central figures in supernatural legends.

members.entity_description: Houses or locations believed to be inhabited or influenced by ghosts or supernatural entities, frequently depicted as dangerous settings in urban legends and folklore.
Unusual, unidentified, or supernatural beings that appear as central figures in many legends and urban myths, often evoking fear and curiosity.
Visual manifestations of ghosts or spirits, commonly described in supernatural stories and legends.

cluster_classes.class_description: Supernatural or ominous elements in urban legends, such as cursed items or locations with troubling histories, that embody hidden danger.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: haunted houses with dark pasts, and cursed objects

members.entity_description: Troubling or violent histories associated with haunted houses in these urban legend descriptions.
Objects believed to carry a curse, bringing misfortune or danger to those who encounter them.

remarks: After moving cursed objects to the phenomena/manifestations class, this class is focused on narrative backstory/condition rather than concrete items; label and description updated accordingly.

args.new_description: Abstract ideas referring to phenomena beyond normal scientific understanding, including the supernatural, the paranormal, and the broader notion of the unknown and its existence in people's beliefs and imaginations.
args.justification: This class cleanly covers abstract belief-level notions (supernatural, unknown, paranormal); assigning a shared Class_Group clarifies its relation to other supernatural-focused classes in the cluster.

args.new_description: Story-focused entities and narrative frames centered on supernatural or unexplained events in folklore and urban legends, including tales about the supernatural and unresolved mysteries that drive such stories.
args.justification: This class groups story-level uses of the supernatural; aligning its Class_Group with other supernatural-related classes connects narrative motifs with the broader supernatural domain.

args.new_description: Concrete locations, objects, beings, and manifestations associated with supernatural activity, such as haunted houses, cursed objects, ghostly apparitions, and mysterious creatures in legends.
args.justification: This class already covers concrete manifestations like haunted houses, apparitions, and mysterious creatures; expanding the description to include cursed objects and setting a shared Class_Group clarifies its scope within the supernatural domain.

args.new_description: Intangible backstories and conditions that imbue supernatural settings and elements with danger, such as dark or violent pasts and histories that make places or items feel cursed in urban legends.
args.remark: After moving cursed objects to the phenomena/manifestations class, this class is focused on narrative backstory/condition rather than concrete items; label and description updated accordingly.
args.justification: Within this class, 'dark pasts' are narrative backstory elements, whereas 'cursed objects' are concrete manifestations that fit better with supernatural phenomena; narrowing this class to backstories and assigning it to the common supernatural domain improves conceptual coherence.

'Cursed objects' are concrete items believed to carry a curse and function as supernatural manifestations (like haunted houses or ghostly apparitions), so they belong with Supernatural Phenomena rather than with purely narrative backstory elements.

executed_decisions.new_description: Abstract ideas referring to phenomena beyond normal scientific understanding, including the supernatural, the paranormal, and the broader notion of the unknown and its existence in people's beliefs and imaginations.
executed_decisions.justification: This class cleanly covers abstract belief-level notions (supernatural, unknown, paranormal); assigning a shared Class_Group clarifies its relation to other supernatural-focused classes in the cluster.
